subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Greater Risks Linked To Popular Diabetes Drug
body:
A new scientific analysis links the widely prescribed diabetes drug Avandia 
to greater risk of heart attack and possibly death.









Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
